description: Defines a sealed class 'Result' with subclasses 'Success' and 'Error' for representing operation outcomes, used throughout the application.

classes.name: Result
classes.description: A sealed class representing success or error outcomes, with generic success data and error message.

classes.name: Success
classes.description: Data class representing a successful result, optionally holding data of type T.

classes.name: Error
classes.description: Data class representing an error result with a message and optional throwable.

methods.name: Success
methods.description: Constructor for success result, accepting optional data.

methods.name: Error
methods.description: Constructor for error result, accepting message and optional throwable.
